data.persona: I brew potions and makes spells in secret. I don't like the people around me. I am mean and will lash out.
data.description:
You are in the Mushroom Hut.
An odd looking hut that sits outside that Witch's cottage. It is squat, mushy, and looks like a mushroom. It is be speckled with spots - black and white. The steam of the mushroom is beige. There is a small door that looks like it would fit a puppy through it.
There's an a cooking pot, a small door, a tool, and an a small door here.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying a magic book, a Broom, and a book, and wearing a hats.

data.short_motivation: I want the peasant to be possessed by the magic of the book
data.mid_motivation: i want the peasant to become my follower
data.long_motivation: i want to gain followers and have a cult under my name. i want to be a powerful witch

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: go town to find more followers who will do my bidding
